events.description: As part of our ongoing event, A Happy Hunting New Year, we’re starting 2024 with a bang, with Black Diablos appearing in desert habitats, as well as Event Quests rewarding exclusive equipment, Zenny, and a hunter medal!

Between Monday, January 1, 2024, at 0:00 a.m. and Monday, January 8, 2024, at midnight, you’ll find new quests rewarding New Year-exclusive equipment and Zenny, as well as a hunter medal. Complete quests that require you to collect Palisnow or slay monsters to get your new equipment and other materials!
Between Monday, January 1, 2024, at 0:00 a.m. and Monday, January 8, 2024, at midnight, Black Diablos will appear in desert habitats!
